sentence: As it will cost you to travel to the restaurants in town eating on site is preferred

I would encourage you to think about your guests and a workable a la carte menu for your weekend guests so they stay at the resort and relax not head out for decent food at decent prices and smaller quantities
There are a lot of free water sports like kayaking sailing water trampoline fish feeding or you can pay a small fee to use the inflatable obstacle course
We ate at the main restaurant for dinner and for the price you pay it was really disappointing
We were also surprised when we arrived to pay for the buffet on Saturday night that it was 75 dollars not 53 as we had understood thank you to very misleading advertising
Food was over priced and very average
No sign up to advise of price amp not told when booking table
Dirty tables long wait for food conflicting information on breakfast buffet prices email requesting clarification and refund request sent but so far it has been ignored
A little dated but for the price I paid I was happy with my stay
Had to pay for some activities eg bikes which were old and rusty
Completely unaceptable when we are paying guests and with young children
Stephen Williams and family 3 nights from England Reception over charged us for the room they took money for the room twice
We stayed as part of a wedding group and I was charged 50 more than my mother in the room next to me
Also after I left I was charged additional 1520
The restaurant over priced when taking children
Overall not terrible but the buffet both breakfast and dinner are over priced
We will never eat there again unles completely desperate and the staff need to be trained in customer service and standards required in a highly rated establishment such as Novatel
Considering the size of our family and expense my parents went to overall cost close to 500
When I first started organising this event and then subsequently booked and paid first deposit I was allocated an events coordinator group acomodation coordinator and deposit funds coordinator
Fell short of a four star rated facility and just about bordering on a three star
I had a 2 bedroom rooftop unit at oaks seaforth at Xmas time for what I was charged
All in one food fun and bed food a little expensive but very good
Never again get your act together Acor we paid big money for this membership
I am glad it was free though because it definitely was n’t worth the 170 we were going to pay
Room was clean and comfortable however I found the food options of an evening limited and the pricing was expensive for what it was
We have paid less and got so much better this was meant to be a stay away as we can not go on our honeymoon yet

All of the staff were extremely friendly and helpful the staff in charge of the water activities were excellent and both restaurants and staff were perfect looking forward to our next visit in 12 months
The rooms were very clean staff in all areas above average I thought your breakfast charges were way over the top this was a business trip but plaining a family day late December
We Hired a Basic room which you get what you pay for
Breakfast was a wonderful buffet at a great price if chosen at time of booking
Great family detination but meals are expensive
Also other reviews about free water sports is baloney as the hotel charges extra for this
We did not feel it was a good selection for us and very expensive
Staff told because of I booked through the bokingcom I got that price and that room
SO pizza was amazing but pricey at the bar with a great bar staff it was
The new renovations to the lobby are great but the rooms are very tired which is fine however the price per night does not match the quality
